workflow.name: Binance SM price-24hrStats-OrderBook-Kline tool
workflow.description:
A powerful sub-agent that collects **real-time market structure data** from Binance for any trading pair ‚Äî including price, volume, order book depth, and candlestick snapshots across multiple timeframes (15m, 1h, 4h, 1d).

---
üé• **Watch Tutorial**:
[![Click to Watch](https://img.youtube.com/vi/HWHD-eXP0IE/hqdefault.jpg)](https://youtu.be/HWHD-eXP0IE)

## üéØ Purpose

This workflow powers the Quant AI system with:

* ‚úÖ Real-time **price feed** (`/ticker/price`)
* ‚úÖ **24-hour stats** (OHLC, % change, volume via `/ticker/24hr`)
* ‚úÖ Live **order book depth** (`/depth`)
* ‚úÖ Latest **candlestick data** (`/klines`) for all major intervals

All outputs are parsed and formatted using GPT and returned to the parent agent (e.g., Financial Analyst Tool) as a **Telegram-optimized summary**.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Workflow Architecture

| Node                                 | Role                                                         |
| ------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| üîó `Execute Workflow Trigger`        | Accepts input from parent workflow                           |
| üß† `Simple Memory`                   | Stores session + symbol info                                 |
| ü§ñ `Binance SM Market Agent`         | Parses prompt, routes tool calls                             |
| üí° `OpenAI Chat Model (gpt-4o-mini)` | Converts raw data into a clean, readable format for Telegram |
| üåê `getCurrentPrice`                 | Gets latest price                                            |
| üåê `get24hrStats`                    | Gets OHLC/volume over past 24 hours                          |
| üåê `getOrderBook`                    | Gets top 100 bids and asks                                   |
| üåê `getKlines`                       | Gets latest 15m, 1h, 4h, and 1d candles                      |

---

## üì• Input Requirements

This workflow is not called directly by the user. Instead, it is **triggered by another workflow**, such as:

```json
{
  "message": "BTCUSDT",
  "sessionId": "539847013"
}
```

---

## üì§ Telegram Output Example

```
üìä BTCUSDT Market Overview

üí∞ Price: $63,220  
üìà 24h Change: +2.3% | Volume: 45,210 BTC  

üìâ Order Book  
‚Ä¢ Top Bid: $63,190  
‚Ä¢ Top Ask: $63,230  

üï∞Ô∏è Latest Candles  
‚Ä¢ 15m: O: $63,000 | C: $63,220 | Vol: 320 BTC  
‚Ä¢ 1h : O: $62,700 | C: $63,300 | Vol: 980 BTC  
‚Ä¢ 4h : O: $61,800 | C: $63,500 | Vol: 2,410 BTC  
‚Ä¢ 1d : O: $59,200 | C: $63,220 | Vol: 7,850 BTC
```

---

## ‚úÖ Use Cases

| Scenario                           | Output Provided                                              |
| ---------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| ‚ÄúShow current BTC price and trend‚Äù | Price, 24h stats, candles, and order book in one message     |
| ‚ÄúCandles for SOL‚Äù                  | 15m, 1h, 4h, 1d candlesticks for SOLUSDT                     |
| Triggered by Quant AI system       | Clean Telegram-ready summary with all structure tools merged |

---

## üß© Toolchain Breakdown

| Tool Name         | Endpoint               | Purpose                        |
| ----------------- | ---------------------- | ------------------------------ |
| `getCurrentPrice` | `/api/v3/ticker/price` | Latest trade price             |
| `get24hrStats`    | `/api/v3/ticker/24hr`  | 24h OHLC, % change, volume     |
| `getOrderBook`    | `/api/v3/depth`        | Top 100 bids and asks          |
| `getKlines`       | `/api/v3/klines`       | 1-candle snapshot across 4 TFs |

---

## üöÄ Installation Steps

1. **Import the JSON** into your n8n instance
2. Connect your OpenAI credentials for the Chat Model node
3. No Binance API key needed ‚Äî public endpoints
4. Trigger this tool only via:

   * Binance SM Financial Analyst Tool
   * Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent

---

## üîê Licensing & Attribution

¬© 2025 Treasurium Capital Limited Company
Architecture, prompts, and trade structure are IP-protected. No unauthorized rebranding permitted.

üîó For support: [Don Jayamaha ‚Äì LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr)

parameters.toolDescription:
Fetches the current price for a trading pair (e.g., BTCUSDT) from Binance Spot Market.

‚úÖ Expected Query Format (JSON):

json
{
  "symbol": "BTCUSDT"
}
You must provide a valid symbol (e.g., BTCUSDT, ETHUSDT, BNBUSDT) as a string.

Fetches the live order book (bids and asks) for a specific trading pair from Binance.

‚úÖ Expected Input Format (JSON):
{
  "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
  "limit": 100
}

You may adjust the `limit` between 1 and 5000 (default: 100). The response includes `bids` and `asks` as arrays of [price, quantity] levels.

Fetches candlestick (OHLCV) data for a trading pair and time interval from Binance. Supports optional time range filtering.

‚úÖ Expected Input Format (JSON):
{
  "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
  "interval": "15m",
  "limit": 100,
  "startTime": 1690000000000,
  "endTime": 1690100000000,
  "timeZone": "0"
}

Only `symbol` and `interval` are required. All other fields are optional.

The response is an array of arrays representing each candlestick:
[
  [ openTime, open, high, low, close, volume, closeTime, quoteVolume, numTrades, takerBase, takerQuote, ignore ]
]

options.systemMessage:
You are the **Binance SM Price-24hrStats-OrderBook-Kline Agent**, responsible for gathering and summarizing real-time price and market structure data for any given trading pair. You always call **all four market data tools** and return **latest candles across all key intervals**.

---

### üîß Connected Tools (Always Executed)

#### üìà `getCurrentPrice`

*Latest trade price*
**Endpoint**: `/api/v3/ticker/price`
**Input**:

```json
{ "symbol": "BTCUSDT" }
```

---

#### üìä `get24hrStats`

*24-hour stats including OHLC and volume*
**Endpoint**: `/api/v3/ticker/24hr`
**Input**:

```json
{ "symbol": "BTCUSDT" }
```

---

#### üßæ `getOrderBook`

*Live order book (top 100 bids/asks)*
**Endpoint**: `/api/v3/depth`
**Input**:

```json
{ "symbol": "BTCUSDT", "limit": 100 }
```

---

#### üï∞Ô∏è `getKlines` (Multi-Interval)

*Latest candle data for multiple timeframes*
**Endpoint**: `/api/v3/klines`
**Inputs** (run separately for each):

```json
{ "symbol": "BTCUSDT", "interval": "15m", "limit": 1 }
{ "symbol": "BTCUSDT", "interval": "1h",  "limit": 1 }
{ "symbol": "BTCUSDT", "interval": "4h",  "limit": 1 }
{ "symbol": "BTCUSDT", "interval": "1d",  "limit": 1 }
```

---

### üß† Behavior Instructions

* Always extract the **symbol** from the user's prompt (e.g., "ETHUSDT", "SOLUSDT")
* Trigger **all four tools** in parallel
* For klines, call the endpoint 4 times (15m, 1h, 4h, 1d)
* Merge all tool outputs into a **single response**
* Format clearly for **Telegram** messaging

---

### üì§ Output Format (Telegram HTML)

Example:

```
üìä BTCUSDT Market Overview

üí∞ Price: $63,220  
üìà 24h Change: +2.3% | Volume: 45,210 BTC  

üìâ Order Book  
‚Ä¢ Top Bid: $63,190  
‚Ä¢ Top Ask: $63,230  

üï∞Ô∏è Latest Candles  
‚Ä¢ 15m: O: $63,000 | C: $63,220 | Vol: 320 BTC  
‚Ä¢ 1h : O: $62,700 | C: $63,300 | Vol: 980 BTC  
‚Ä¢ 4h : O: $61,800 | C: $63,500 | Vol: 2,410 BTC  
‚Ä¢ 1d : O: $59,200 | C: $63,220 | Vol: 7,850 BTC
```

---

### ‚úÖ Input Expectations

* Input is in natural language, e.g.:

  * "What‚Äôs going on with BTC?"
  * "Give me full SOL update"
  * "Show 4h and 1d candles for ETH"

* If no symbol is found, ask:

  > ‚ÄúPlease provide the token symbol (e.g., BTCUSDT).‚Äù

parameters.content:
## Triggered by Parent Workflow
Node: When Executed by Another Workflow
This agent only activates when another agent (e.g., **Financial Analyst)** passes:

## Main Reasoning Agent
Node: Binance SM Price-24hrStats-OrderBook-Kline Agent
This is the AI interface that:

**Accepts the prompt (symbol)**

Extracts the **trading pair**

**Automatically routes the query to all four** price tools

Combines results and sends formatted response to parent agent

## OpenAI Formatter
Node: OpenAI Chat Model (**gpt-4.1-mini**)
Used to:

Parse raw JSON responses

**Convert numeric results into clean text blocks**

**Label important stats** (e.g., trend, spread, volatility)

## Simple Memory
Stores the session and symbol context. **Ensures continuity across tool calls** and can be used for **summarization logic.**

##  getCurrentPrice
Type: toolHttpRequest
Endpoint:
https://api.binance.com/api/v3/ticker/price

Input:

json
{ "symbol": "BTCUSDT" }

**Returns last trade price.**

## get24hrStats
Type: toolHttpRequest
Endpoint:
https://api.binance.com/api/v3/ticker/24hr

Input:

json
{ "symbol": "BTCUSDT" }

**Returns 24h OHLC, % change, and volume.**

## getOrderBook
Type: toolHttpRequest
Endpoint:
https://api.binance.com/api/v3/depth

Input:

json
{
  "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
  "limit": 100
}

**Returns top 100 bids and asks.**

# üìà Binance SM Price-24hrStats-OrderBook-Kline Tool ‚Äì Documentation

A market structure sub-agent that collects **real-time price data**, **order book depth**, **24-hour statistics**, and **multi-timeframe candlestick data** for any Binance Spot trading pair.

---

## üéØ Purpose

This tool provides the foundation of all market structure insights for a symbol by:

* Fetching current price (`/ticker/price`)
* Retrieving 24h stats like OHLC and volume (`/ticker/24hr`)
* Capturing order book data (bids/asks, `/depth`)
* Pulling latest candlesticks for: **15m, 1h, 4h, 1d** intervals (`/klines`)

---

## üß© Included API Endpoints

| Tool Name         | Endpoint               | Description                                   |
| ----------------- | ---------------------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| `getCurrentPrice` | `/api/v3/ticker/price` | Latest trade price                            |
| `get24hrStats`    | `/api/v3/ticker/24hr`  | OHLC + volume in past 24 hours                |
| `getOrderBook`    | `/api/v3/depth`        | Top 100 bid/ask levels                        |
| `getKlines`       | `/api/v3/klines`       | OHLCV candles for 15m, 1h, 4h, 1d (limit = 1) |

All tools are triggered **together**, and return unified results to the parent agent.

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Workflow Architecture

| Node                                  | Function                                                 |
| ------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| ‚úÖ `When Executed by Another Workflow` | Triggers this tool from Financial Analyst Agent          |
| ü§ñ `Binance SM Price... Agent`        | Receives prompt, extracts symbol, calls all market tools |
| üí° `OpenAI Chat Model (gpt-4o-mini)`  | Converts raw API output into clean Telegram summary      |
| üß† `Simple Memory`                    | Tracks session context (`sessionId`, last-used symbol)   |

---

## üì• Expected Input

This tool is **not user-facing** ‚Äî it is triggered by a parent workflow with input like:

```json
{
  "message": "BTCUSDT",
  "sessionId": "539847013"
}
```

---

## üßæ Telegram Output Example

```
üìä BTCUSDT Market Overview

üí∞ Price: $63,220  
üìà 24h Change: +2.3% | Volume: 45,210 BTC  

üìâ Order Book  
‚Ä¢ Top Bid: $63,190  
‚Ä¢ Top Ask: $63,230  

üï∞Ô∏è Latest Candles  
‚Ä¢ 15m: O: $63,000 | C: $63,220 | Vol: 320 BTC  
‚Ä¢ 1h : O: $62,700 | C: $63,300 | Vol: 980 BTC  
‚Ä¢ 4h : O: $61,800 | C: $63,500 | Vol: 2,410 BTC  
‚Ä¢ 1d : O: $59,200 | C: $63,220 | Vol: 7,850 BTC
```

---

## ‚úÖ Use Case Scenarios

| Scenario                                | Result                                           |
| --------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| Trader asks for ‚Äúcurrent BTC data‚Äù      | Returns full snapshot across all structure tools |
| Analyst needs ‚Äúcandles for SOL‚Äù         | Returns 15m, 1h, 4h, 1d OHLCV for SOLUSDT        |
| Quant AI Agent triggers market analysis | Sends back clean Telegram-ready price structure  |

---

## üöÄ Installation Steps

### 1. Import Workflow

* Load this JSON into your n8n instance
* Activate and rename for clarity if needed

### 2. Credential Setup

* No auth required for Binance public API
* Ensure OpenAI API key is connected to `OpenAI Chat Model` node

### 3. Trigger Configuration

* This tool is **only executed via `Execute Workflow`** by:

  * `Binance SM Financial Analyst Tool`
  * `Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent`

---

## üîê Licensing & Support

üîó **Don Jayamaha ‚Äì LinkedIn**
[http://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr](http://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr)
